DataElement.preferredName: Reduced Skin Flap Survival Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for a continuance of life or existence especially under adverse conditions of a type of reconstruction, in which a flap of tissue is surgically moved from another area of the body, is less in size or amount.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A continuance of life or existence especially under adverse conditions of a type of reconstruction, in which a flap of tissue is surgically moved from another area of the body, is less in size or amount.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Made less in size or amount or degree.

Concepts.definition: Made less in size or amount or degree.

Property.preferredDefinition: An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.:A type of breast reconstruction in which a flap of tissue is surgically moved from another area of the body to the chest, and formed into a new breast mound.:Continuance of life or existence especially under adverse conditions; includes methods and philosophy of survival.

Concepts.definition: An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.
Breast reconstruction that uses tissues taken from other parts of the individual's body.
Continuance of life or existence especially under adverse conditions; includes methods and philosophy of survival.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the outcome or resolution of the patient's adverse events.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/28/2017: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

DataElement.changeDescription: 11/28/2017: CM Released as part of draft content review
